word: das Lesen, die There is no plural form for "das lesen" as it is an activity or concept rather than a concrete noun.
definition: The act of interpreting and comprehending written text, typically involving the extraction of meaning and information from written materials. It is commonly employed for various purposes, such as reading books, articles, newspapers, or any written content.

examples.german: Er liest die Zeitung jeden Morgen.
examples.english: He reads the newspaper every morning.

examples.german: Sie hat gestern ein Buch gelesen.
Wir lesen gerade einen spannenden Roman.
examples.english: We are currently reading an exciting novel.

examples.german: Das Kind kann schon lesen und schreiben.
examples.english: The child can already read and write.
